short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the red 'New Prime Loot' notification on Twitch's website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I got tired of manually clicking the Prime Loot button to remove the annoying red circle, which is how this primitive extension was born. 

Why does it require permissions?

The way browser extensions work, it is impossible to change any element on a website without getting permissions for that particular website. Thus, in order to remove the notification element, this extension needs access to the Twitch's website.
